synopsis.text: Yuushi, a 17-year-old girl trapped in the body of a 10-year-old due to a spell, is determined to break free from her curse and live as her true age. When she is selected as a candidate to become the next Petite Princess, she embarks on a journey to the prestigious Princess Academy to compete for the Eternal Tiara, a legendary crown that can grant any wish. Along with other candidates, Yuushi must learn the ways of magic, dance, etiquette, and defense to prove herself worthy of becoming the Platinum Princess, chosen only once every thousand years. With the help of her rivals-turned-friends, Yuushi must grow in heart and strength to claim the tiara and finally live the life she desires. Will Yuushi's unwavering optimism and cheerful spirit be enough to overcome the challenges that lie ahead and make her dream come true? Only time will tell in this enchanting tale of friendship, growth, and adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
